rules: Be cool, kind, and civil. Treat all members with respect.
Do not spam (especially other discord servers). No self-promotion.
No harassment, abuse, racism, sexism or otherwise offensive content.
Please do not tag or DM the staff.
It is forbidden to sell resources/services in this Discord, this is not an end-user script market.
Do not ask for support. We do not offer public support in this Discord.
No advertising (This includes your YouTube channel, Discord server, RP server, and your paid scripts).
This is not the place for you to search for scripts, or find a developer to help you with your server.
